pkgmetadata.longdescription: pywin32-stubs=============pywin32-stubs is generated from pywin32.chm, it contains: - win32-stubs- win32comext-stubs - pythonwin-stubs - win32helper : this packagedefines win32typing and constants.Installation============ pip install pywin32-stubsUsage=====.. code:: python import win32gui import win32helper.win32con as con win32gui.MessageBox(0, "hello", 'shit', con.MB_OK)
